title: User Registration & Login
content: Implement user registration and login functionality.

title: Authentication Method
content:
Use JWT tokens for authentication.

Update: Use JWT tokens for authentication with the FastAPI backend.

title: Authentication Credentials
content: Users will register and log in using email/password.

title: Authentication UI Flow
content:
Separate pages are required for user login and signup.

Update: Dedicated login and registration pages on the frontend with proper form validation.

title: Private Todo Lists
content: Each user will have their own private todo list, not accessible by other users.

title: Authentication Functionality
content: Users must be able to register new accounts, log in, log out, and reset forgotten passwords.

title: Todo List Privacy
content: Each user's todo list must be private with no sharing between users.

title: JWT Token Handling & Route Protection
content: JWT tokens must be stored securely on the frontend. Backend API routes requiring authentication must be protected by middleware.
